languages.text: "Не вздумайте проявлять милосердие даже к капле этой скверны, {name}". {n}Голос Хейнрикса звенит от холодной ярости.{/n}
"Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не вздумайте проявлять милосердие даже к капле этой скверны, {name}". {n}Голос Хейнрикса звенит от холодной ярости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single speck of this filth, {name}". {n}Heinrix's voice is ringing with tempered fury.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ni se le ocurra pensar en conceder piedad a una sola parte de esta amenaza, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix resuena con una furia helada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ni se le ocurra pensar en conceder piedad a una sola parte de esta amenaza, {name}». {n}La voz de Heinrix resuena con una furia helada.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「このような災いに情けをかけてやろうなどと、考えないことですね、{name}」{n}ハインリックスの声は冷たい怒りに満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「このような災いに情けをかけてやろうなどと、考えないことですね、{name}」{n}ハインリックスの声は冷たい怒りに満ちている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “别打算对它们手下留情，{name}。这群怪物一个都不能放过。”{n}海因里希的声音中带着冰冷的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别打算对它们手下留情，{name}。这群怪物一个都不能放过。”{n}海因里希的声音中带着冰冷的怒火。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Denkt nicht einmal daran, auch nur einem Ableger dieser Bedrohung Gnade zu gewähren, {name}." {n}In Heinrixs Stimme liegt kalter Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Denkt nicht einmal daran, auch nur einem Ableger dieser Bedrohung Gnade zu gewähren, {name}." {n}In Heinrixs Stimme liegt kalter Zorn.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ne songez même pas à épargner la moindre ramification de cette menace, {name}. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix vibre au diapason d'une colère glaciale.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne songez même pas à épargner la moindre ramification de cette menace, {name}. » {n}La voix d'Heinrix vibre au diapason d'une colère glaciale.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu illetin soyundan gelen tek bir kimseye bile merhamet göstermeyi düşünme {name}." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, buz gibi bir öfkeyle çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not even think about showing mercy to a single offshoot of this menace, {name}." {n}Heinrix's voice rings with cold fury.{/n}
